about_the_game:
Hafgufa

From the bustling cities of Miklagard to the courts of Neustria, everyone knows the name Hafgufa. Renowned as expert negotiators and unparalleled merchants, their shopkeepers traverse the land with fleets of caravans, steadily dominating markets and prospering in wealth and triumph. Their next conquest? Northgard!

Njörd, the Warchief

While others spent their lives mastering the sword, Njörd wandered the world perfecting the noble art of negotiation. Armed with this unmatched knowledge, he can make any price drop with a simple glance. Need more wood for your caravan? Make do without it. Requiring that much food to join our clan? We’ll reconsider later! Looking for protection? Njörd’s unique combat style lets him dodge enemy blows and retaliate with a lethal... paddle!




The Caravan

Take charge of a one-of-a-kind mobile building! These caravans can venture deep into uncolonized lands and be deployed in neutral territories to establish temporary settlements. Ideal for exploring ruins, salvaging shipwrecks, or setting up a strategic outpost near rival clans.

──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

The Shopkeepers

The backbone of your clan, shopkeepers are inseparably tied to your caravans, gathering essential resources as they travel. With the right knowledge, they can even deliver their collected goods directly to any targeted clan or faction, turning trade into your ultimate weapon.

──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

Employee Comfort Guaranteed!

If one of your territories comes under attack, don’t worry! Your units can safely garrison inside their assigned buildings, remaining protected until reinforcements arrive. Need villagers in a pinch? Simply recruit them instantly by paying with food.

──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────



Andvaranaut Ring

More valuable than friendship? Absolutely. It’s the most precious thing that you can ever own! With such power at your fingertips, you can confidently trade away batches of hard-earned relations for kröwns without hesitation! Falling short on relations with a potential trading partner? No problem, just buy their favor and secure the deal.
